declare @stt_rec char(13), @maxLength int select @maxLength = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = 'mpkcsx' and column_name = 'so_ct' select stt_rec into #d1 from mpctyc where exists(select 1 from @s where patindex('%'+ rtrim(case when stt_rec <> '' then stt_rec else '*' end) + '%', text) > 0) declare cr cursor for select stt_rec from #d1 open cr fetch next from cr into @stt_rec while @@fetch_status = 0 begin exec rs_MPSExtractPlannedOrder @stt_rec, @ma_kho, 'SX1', @maxLength, @@userID fetch next from cr into @stt_rec end close cr deallocate cr
drop table #d1 select '1' as v return
